item.description: About me # My name is Damian, I’m 23 years old, and I have been programming in Python for several years. I work as a Python developer in one of the largest banks in Poland. I am interested in cybersecurity, rockets, and automotive industry. I am a co-founder of the Walet-Sec CTF team. Projects: # The projects I am currently working on are: Spartan - a TCP/IP port scanner with script support.
